00140 inline void modules::options::SetOption(const std::string& name, const std::string& option){
00141     // if a new key was added, store an iterator in the order list
00142     OptionsList_t::iterator it = fOptions.find(name);
00143     fOptions[name]=option;
00144     if(it==fOptions.end()) fOrder.push_back(fOptions.find(name));
00145 }
00146 
00147 inline bool modules::options::HasOption(const std::string& name)const{
00148     return fOptions.find(name)!=fOptions.end();
00149 }
